Blog.post: 5th round played jeslin then won....6th round played liu yang...then damn farnie..jason waas asking me to draw wif her..then after some persuading, i drew wif her....7th round played FM terry chua(lolx...)n won quickly...8th round played wif a cheap guy....from the start onli play for my time:(in the end two pawns up...then b cos of time,everything screwed up:( n i lost...i was lyk going to cry??i was lyk cannot b lief it...nvm....its over liao...last rd played wif darling's mei n won quite quickly....i think she dont noe the opening well?? in the end tie for 6th wif gabriel, sean n my 8th round opponent RICHARD LEAN...got onli 37$$(suppose to b 37.50!!!) luckily found my wallet from the front office..but when i open the wallet all the money gone:( the winnings of my tournament not even half of my money lost:( nvm...at least the things r still inside:P... cool!!!u r oming back tmr liaoz..hope to hear ur voice soon:P

tournament sux....1.5 wth manz...won christer, lost shaobin,draw gabriel(arranged) n lost to han wei....wth manx..feel damn screwed.... then afterwards found out that i lost my wallet....(again.....wtf.4th time)this time worst...tmdwtf....feeling so screwed... in the car, my father was scolding lyk mad.....play so badly still go n lose my wallet......ask me to go n die...:'( i cried silently. feeling damn hurt...i dont think i can go out anywhere during this holiday...hav to mug lyk mad:( my father say my studies sux.....might as well quit everything n gnd....wth manx....its not lyk i screw up exams all the time:(... yah....my father was also saying how stupid can i get..... wtf manx....cannot take it anymore.... feel so hurt....not b cos my father slap me....its the words he use on me:( wad should i do.....someone plz tell me...

sianz...todae no skool so stsy at home slack. carn b lief tmr is National Rapid le!!!:( haven prepare well enuff(i think sure die liaoz)must play damn well to meet my target of at least 7!!i think that is quite hard as all the players r damn strong!!nvm...as long as i try my best...i will b satisfied. no....mr tu still haven tell me who is that..he only hint to me that she played may li in the indivs.....how come mr tu lyk that one??nvm. when r u coming back....i need to talk to u....dying for ur voice liaoz.... for the past 4 daes i hav been missing ur voice loads...most importantly i miss u lyk mad... xh, i need u!!where r u now??:'(

todae last dae of skool....played chinese chess as usual. then suddenly this chinese chess teacher pop in n told me that i m in for the dunno wad tournament!!!wth...its lyk crazy...i dun reali want to play one:( stupid teacher lah...nvm:( after skool went to play bb at dover...me dary1 alanNO.1 n dt went to challenge some fairfield pple...then in the end got thrashed badly:( NOOOOOOOOOO....i feel that i cant study anymore...i lost my touch:(...wad am i doin now???argh...my father was scolding me lyk mad:( hahaz...my father called u AH HUAN(i think)...i was laughing lyk mad....hehez. it was damn funny!!!damn cool rite??? hope to c u soon!!!

xh....i want to talk to you...i miss ur voice. how r u doing now?? is ur team winning?? dont give up k..."the best is yet to be":P(lolz!) i really miss u liao...nv get to hear u this few daes, i felt terrible:(....felt very restless... hope to see u soon!! just wanna tell u....i love u always,no matter wad.
xh, u r just in my mind all the time. i cant stop thinking abt u. *muacks* i love u loads!!!i will love u even more as time goes by....

last night was damn farnie...i put on my msn nick "brandon said that someone is damn CHIO...while the others beg to differ" he was lyk damn funny....lolz. This was soon stop when bk put on his msn nick "weiCheng said that he n xh together...wc,change ur nick b4 i complete this sentence" i was larfing lyk crazy....lolz... school was quite boring today.....spent the whole time playing bb n chinese chess!!! Quite cool...got a few "students" to teach...they all super joker,alwaes make patzer moves....lolz sighz...school ended juat lyk that. went to KAP wif frenz... soon come home le... sianz....when will i get to c u again?? so long:'( i love u loads!!!i miss u lyk crazzyyyyyy!!:( hope to see u soon...i m looking forward to seeing u.(and my present!!!lolz:P)

cool!!! today after assembly walked to NUS to watch C div tennis finals between acs(i) n RI... damn cool.....while i was walking ard....nth to do, then suddenly i saw my "sworn" brother Sean!!! he was lyk damn shocked...(me also lah!!!)yah then we talk for a while n continued to watch the finals...obviously our school won coz we hav the under 18 1st n 3rd player in our school, matthew n hala tan(lolz). walked back to school went for recess....not much of a recess actually,was lyk PE......played bb for lyk 1hr++. in the end was late for class:( after goin to class,greeted the teacher...i sneaked out of my class n went to 2.4 to play chiness chess!!!cool manx...2.4 class teacher was damn blur!!thought that i was one of the student of tt class...i was lyk okok....,i m in ur class...:P hahax!! after school when going home, i saw ailin on the bus!!!i was lyk huh???quite shocked... nvm...i think she nv see me...soon she alighted somewhere at clementi (sunset way???)i finally reached nanyang...while i was waiting at nanyang for a straight bus home, i saw this chi chess player i played in the last tournament...he just waved at me for a while and continued to look serious???okok....got onto the bus, the bus stopped at opp coronation plaza....i saw jeslin!!!i was lyk omxh...how come today see so many pple one!!!nvm. she was damn dao anywae.... reach home liao....so decided to blog..... Darling....can u hear me??i want to tell u i miss u!! how r u doin now?? rest well for ur tournament....hope u hav fun there!! rem to buy me sth:P
sianz..tmr is NAG liaoz. very scared that i will screw up lyk anything:( ......

joshua loh sux big time......hate him.hate him.hate him.hate him. wanna kill him!!! wad the fuck man...after winning a tyco game against me and my bro....go n boast n boast n boast.....wtf! its not lyk he so pro lyk that.... he sux lorh....if without gabriel, he would be at a total lost position.fuck him....fuck him....GO TO HELL JOSHUA.... later in the "chessu cs competition" me n my bro against nat JOSHUA n jace... joshua lyk tyco tyco kill me or my bro then start calling us losers...also go n boast to nat n jace..."did u guys see that!!!" wad the fuck lorh...its lyk he got the LEAST kills, still go n boast ard....wad the fuck....he think he super noob at cs lorh...normal kill he go n say until headshot....its lyk 90% lorh...i wanted to slap his face n ask him to kiss my asss....wad the fuck siax... fuck fuck fuck.....joshua is a FUCKER....fuck off n go n die....

chinese chess tournament sux lyk shit....dunno wad i playing also:( for the stupid team event scored 5.5/7(soso).wasted lyk dunno wad...give free pieces away lyk dunno wad but tycoly manage to get a draw!!! sighz... the blitz thing is the worst....6.5!!!( out of 11 :( ) wth..,dunno play wad also...tech foul three four times also i never claim....then in the end lose lyk mad:( wth... y am i so loser????????????????????sian ar....xiuhuan i need u badly:( é¾æ²é¢¨ Long juan feng Composer: Jay Chou (å¨æ°å«) Lyricist: Vivian Hsu (å¾è¥ç) æåä¸é£é¢¨ ai xiang yi zhen feng å¹å®å®å°±èµ° chui wan ta jiu zou éæ¨£çç¯å¥ zhe yang de jie zou èª°é½ç¡å¯å¥ä½ shei dou wu ke nai he æ²æå¦³ä»¥å¾ mei you ni yi hou æéé­å¤±æ§ wo ling hun shi kong é»é²å¨éè½ hei yun zai jiang luo æè¢«å®æèèµ° wo bei ta tuo zhe zou ééææé»é»é¢é jing jing qiao qiao mo mo li kai é·å ¥äºå±éªéç·£ xian ru le wei xian bian yuan Baby~ æçä¸çå·²çé¢¨æ´é¨ wo de shi jie yi kuang feng bao yu Wu~~~~ ææ ä¾çå¤ªå¿«å°±åé¾æ²é¢¨ ai qing lai de tai kuai jiu xiang long juan feng é¢ä¸éæ´é¢¨åä¾ä¸åé li bu kai bao feng quan lai bu ji tao æä¸è½åæ³ wo bu neng zai xiang æä¸è½åæ³ wo bu neng zai xiang æä¸ wo bu æä¸ wo bu æä¸è½ wo bu neng ææ èµ°çå¤ªå¿«å°±åé¾æ²é¢¨ ai qing zou de tai kuai jiu xiang long juan feng ä¸è½æ¿åæå·²ç¡èå¯èº² bu neng cheng shou wo yi wu chu ke duo æä¸è¦åæ³ wo bu yao zai xiang æä¸è¦åæ³ wo bu yao zai xiang æä¸ wo bu æä¸ wo bu æä¸è¦åæ³ä½ wo bu yao zai xiang ni ä¸ç¥ä¸è¦º bu zhi bu jue ä½ å·²ç¶é¢éæ ni yi jing li kai wo ä¸ç¥ä¸è¦º bu zhi bu jue æè·äºéç¯å¥ wo gen le zhe jie zou å¾ç¥å¾è¦º hou zhi hou jue åéäºä¸åç§ you guo le yi ge qiu å¾ç¥å¾è¦º hou zhi hou jue æè©²å¥½å¥½çæ´» wo gai hao hao sheng huo http://www.jaychoustudio.com/jaychoustudio/translations.html#
